      • setMaxRowSizeInBytes

        public SparkStreamsConfigBuilder setMaxRowSizeInBytes(int maxRowSizeInBytes)
        the maximum size of Spark Row in bytes, Spark loader can handle. Because Spark is not aware of PGX runtime, it will always use the default value. Do not change this value in runtime

      • setMinPortRange

        public SparkStreamsConfigBuilder setMinPortRange(int minPortRange)
        PGX will open port with same or larger than this value. If this is 0, PGX will open any available port

      • setNetworkInterface

        public SparkStreamsConfigBuilder setNetworkInterface(java.lang.String networkInterface)
        the name of an interface will be used spark data communication
